BAD_CREDENTIALS: Unknown combination of e-mail address and password.
EMAIL_ALREADY_EXISTS: E-mail address is already in use.
MISSING_ROLE: You are not allowed to perform this operation.
PASSWORD_TOO_LONG: Password is too long. (30 characters max.)
PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password is too short. (6 characters min.)
ROLE_ALREADY_EXISTS: The user already has the selected role.
ROLE_NOT_FOUND: The user does not have the selected role.
